title: A geopolitical recession? Ian Bremmer goes around the world
description:
The European Union blocks Russian oil. The United States pledges to support Taiwan. And elections from Australia to Colombia could shift the balance of power in key countries.

Chuck talks with Ian Bremmer, president of the Eurasia Group and the author of a new book, “The Power of Crisis: How Three Threats – and Our Response – Will Change the World”
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
